name: Bullet Time!
description:
Bullet Time! is an arcade style top-down survival shooter game made for University GameDev League 2022. The game features a hardcore survival gameplay with a one time ability following the theme of One-Time Use known as Bullet Time, allowing the player to stop time and unleash their wrath on the enemies. Careful, though - you only get one chance, so use it wisely!

Any feedback on the game is much appreciated, and if you do like the game please consider voting for us, thank you!

Controls

WASD / Left Stick: Move

Mouse / Right Stick: Aim

Left Mouse / Right Button: Fire

Space / Left Button: Dash

E / Right Trigger: Bullet Time!

Mouse Scroll / A (On XBox Controller): Switch weapon

*Note: Only the jam build is included for now, which contains a few known bugs due to time constraint. A patched version will be released after the voting period ends.
